languages.text: {n}Уралон усмехается.{/n} "То, что служители Инквизитора прямо сейчас поднимают на поверхность. Даже я не ведаю всего предела его могущества. В верных руках оно положит начало новой эпохе, где Великие Четверо воцарятся в Просторе руками своего чемпиона. Твоими руками". {n}Уралон кивает на пару трупов.{/n} "Эти жрицы знали про орудие, однако они сгинули прежде, чем я смог выведать у них его истинную суть".

{n}Uralon chuckles.{/n} "The Inquisitor's servants are raising it to the surface as we speak. The full extent of its might is unknown even to me. In the right hands, it will lay the foundation of a new era in which the Great Four will reign in the Expanse as their champion's effort bears fruit. Your effort." {n}Uralon nods toward the two corpses.{/n} "These priestesses knew about the weapon but perished before I was able to get the truth about its nature out of them."
languages.original_text: {n}Уралон усмехается.{/n} "То, что служители Инквизитора прямо сейчас поднимают на поверхность. Даже я не ведаю всего предела его могущества. В верных руках оно положит начало новой эпохе, где Великие Четверо воцарятся в Просторе руками своего чемпиона. Твоими руками". {n}Уралон кивает на пару трупов.{/n} "Эти жрицы знали про орудие, однако они сгинули прежде, чем я смог выведать у них его истинную суть".

languages.text: {n}乌拉隆笑着开了口。{/n}“就在我们谈话的时候，审判者的仆人正忙着把它送到地表上。那件武器的威力究竟有多大，就连我都不清楚。若是它到了正确之人的手中，它便足以开创新的时代。届时，伟大的混沌四神将会共同统治科罗努斯扩区。这一切都是由于他们的勇士不断努力，最终结出了硕果。你的硕果。”{n}乌拉隆朝两具尸体点了点头。{/n}“这些女祭司了解这件武器，但我还没来得及弄清楚这件武器的本质，她们就死了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon chuckles.{/n} "The Inquisitor's servants are raising it to the surface as we speak. The full extent of its might is unknown even to me. In the right hands, it will lay the foundation of a new era in which the Great Four will reign in the Expanse as their champion's effort bears fruit. Your effort." {n}Uralon nods toward the two corpses.{/n} "These priestesses knew about the weapon but perished before I was able to get the truth about its nature out of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌拉隆笑着开了口。{/n}“就在我们谈话的时候，审判者的仆人正忙着把它送到地表上。那件武器的威力究竟有多大，就连我都不清楚。若是它到了正确之人的手中，它便足以开创新的时代。届时，伟大的混沌四神将会共同统治科罗努斯扩区。这一切都是由于他们的勇士不断努力，最终结出了硕果。你的硕果。”{n}乌拉隆朝两具尸体点了点头。{/n}“这些女祭司了解这件武器，但我还没来得及弄清楚这件武器的本质，她们就死了。”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: {n}Uralon lacht auf.{/n} "Die Diener der Inquisitor heben ihn just in diesem Moment an die Oberfläche. Nicht einmal ich weiß bisher um seine wahre Macht. In den richtigen Händen wird er den Grundstein für eine neue Ära legen, in der die Großen Vier über die Ausdehnung herrschen, während die Bemühungen ihres Champions Früchte tragen. Eure Bemühungen." {n}Uralon nickt in Richtung der zwei Leichen.{/n} "Diese Priesterinnen wussten von der Waffe, sind jedoch gestorben, bevor ich etwas über ihre wahre Natur aus ihnen herausholen konnte."
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon chuckles.{/n} "The Inquisitor's servants are raising it to the surface as we speak. The full extent of its might is unknown even to me. In the right hands, it will lay the foundation of a new era in which the Great Four will reign in the Expanse as their champion's effort bears fruit. Your effort." {n}Uralon nods toward the two corpses.{/n} "These priestesses knew about the weapon but perished before I was able to get the truth about its nature out of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon lacht auf.{/n} "Die Diener der Inquisitor heben ihn just in diesem Moment an die Oberfläche. Nicht einmal ich weiß bisher um seine wahre Macht. In den richtigen Händen wird er den Grundstein für eine neue Ära legen, in der die Großen Vier über die Ausdehnung herrschen, während die Bemühungen ihres Champions Früchte tragen. Eure Bemühungen." {n}Uralon nickt in Richtung der zwei Leichen.{/n} "Diese Priesterinnen wussten von der Waffe, sind jedoch gestorben, bevor ich etwas über ihre wahre Natur aus ihnen herausholen konnte."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: {n}Uralon ríe.{/n} «Los sirvientes del Inquisidor lo están izando hasta la superficie mientras hablamos. Ni siquiera yo conozco el alcance de su poder. En las manos adecuadas, sentará los cimientos de una nueva era en que los Cuatro reinarán en la Extensión cuando los esfuerzos de su adalid den su fruto. Tus esfuerzos». {n}Uralon señala a los dos cadáveres con un gesto de la cabeza.{/n} «Esas sacerdotisas conocían la existencia del arma, mas perecieron antes de que pudiese arrancarles la verdad sobre su naturaleza».
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon chuckles.{/n} "The Inquisitor's servants are raising it to the surface as we speak. The full extent of its might is unknown even to me. In the right hands, it will lay the foundation of a new era in which the Great Four will reign in the Expanse as their champion's effort bears fruit. Your effort." {n}Uralon nods toward the two corpses.{/n} "These priestesses knew about the weapon but perished before I was able to get the truth about its nature out of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon ríe.{/n} «Los sirvientes del Inquisidor lo están izando hasta la superficie mientras hablamos. Ni siquiera yo conozco el alcance de su poder. En las manos adecuadas, sentará los cimientos de una nueva era en que los Cuatro reinarán en la Extensión cuando los esfuerzos de su adalid den su fruto. Tus esfuerzos». {n}Uralon señala a los dos cadáveres con un gesto de la cabeza.{/n} «Esas sacerdotisas conocían la existencia del arma, mas perecieron antes de que pudiese arrancarles la verdad sobre su naturaleza».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: {n}Uralon pousse un petit rire.{/n} « Les serviteurs de l'inquisiteur sont en train de le remonter à la surface. Même moi, j'ignore sa véritable puissance. Entre de bonnes mains, il posera les bases d'une nouvelle ère qui verra les Quatre Grands régner sur les Étendues une fois que les efforts de leur {mf|champion|championne} auront porté leurs fruits. Vos efforts. Ces prêtresses, {n}continue-t-il en indiquant les deux cadavres du menton,{/n} connaissaient l'existence de cette arme, mais ont trouvé la mort avant que je ne puisse leur arracher la vérité à son sujet. »
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon chuckles.{/n} "The Inquisitor's servants are raising it to the surface as we speak. The full extent of its might is unknown even to me. In the right hands, it will lay the foundation of a new era in which the Great Four will reign in the Expanse as their champion's effort bears fruit. Your effort." {n}Uralon nods toward the two corpses.{/n} "These priestesses knew about the weapon but perished before I was able to get the truth about its nature out of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon pousse un petit rire.{/n} « Les serviteurs de l'inquisiteur sont en train de le remonter à la surface. Même moi, j'ignore sa véritable puissance. Entre de bonnes mains, il posera les bases d'une nouvelle ère qui verra les Quatre Grands régner sur les Étendues une fois que les efforts de leur {mf|champion|championne} auront porté leurs fruits. Vos efforts. Ces prêtresses, {n}continue-t-il en indiquant les deux cadavres du menton,{/n} connaissaient l'existence de cette arme, mais ont trouvé la mort avant que je ne puisse leur arracher la vérité à son sujet. »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: {n}ウラロンは苦笑する。{/n}「異端審問官の手下が、こうしている間にもそれを地上へ持って行っている。その力の全容は俺にもわからない。正しい者の手にかかれば、新時代の礎となり、偉大なる四神が、彼らの擁護者の尽力の結果エクスパンスに君臨するだろう。あんた達のおかげでな」{n}ウラロンは顎をしゃくって二人の死体を指し示す。{/n}「この女司祭たちは武器のことを知っていたが、俺がその性質について真実を聞き出す前に死んでしまった」
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon chuckles.{/n} "The Inquisitor's servants are raising it to the surface as we speak. The full extent of its might is unknown even to me. In the right hands, it will lay the foundation of a new era in which the Great Four will reign in the Expanse as their champion's effort bears fruit. Your effort." {n}Uralon nods toward the two corpses.{/n} "These priestesses knew about the weapon but perished before I was able to get the truth about its nature out of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウラロンは苦笑する。{/n}「異端審問官の手下が、こうしている間にもそれを地上へ持って行っている。その力の全容は俺にもわからない。正しい者の手にかかれば、新時代の礎となり、偉大なる四神が、彼らの擁護者の尽力の結果エクスパンスに君臨するだろう。あんた達のおかげでな」{n}ウラロンは顎をしゃくって二人の死体を指し示す。{/n}「この女司祭たちは武器のことを知っていたが、俺がその性質について真実を聞き出す前に死んでしまった」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: {n}Uralon kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Biz konuştuğumuz esnada Engizisyoncu'nun hizmetkârları, onu yüzeye çıkarmakla meşgul. Doğru ellerde yeni bir çağın temellerini atacak... Müdafilerin çabaları, senin çabaların bu çağda meyvesini verirken Büyük Dörtlü de Enginlik'te hüküm sürecek." {n}Uralon, başıyla iki cesedi işaret ediyor.{/n} "Bu rahibeler silahı biliyordu ancak silahın doğasını bana anlatamadan telef oldular."
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon chuckles.{/n} "The Inquisitor's servants are raising it to the surface as we speak. The full extent of its might is unknown even to me. In the right hands, it will lay the foundation of a new era in which the Great Four will reign in the Expanse as their champion's effort bears fruit. Your effort." {n}Uralon nods toward the two corpses.{/n} "These priestesses knew about the weapon but perished before I was able to get the truth about its nature out of them."
